I propose that H.M. Government ensures that all revolving doors in public buildings in the UK revolve clockwise (viewed from above).  This is in accord with the norm for other countries that drive/walk on the left.

Only countries that drive/walk on the right should have revolving doors that turn anti-clockwise.

This measure would avoid confusion, make entry/egress from public buildings simpler and easier.  It would support the British walk on the left tradition.
